HediffDef.label: crude deepblue extracter
HediffDef.description:
A crude deepblue extracter installed. It will produce deepblue every often.

Unistalling will break the extracter.

Being cheapbly built is a benefit for most moyos whitout spare cash. You pay less with cash but you pay the rest with uncomfort and pain of a thick needle buried in your body.

li.label: uncomfortable attachment
li.description: Is this really necessary? I know my blood's worth but this isnt it.

ThingDef.label: crude deepblue extracter
ThingDef.description: A crude deepblue extracter. Install this to a moyo to begin deepblue production.\n\nBeing cheapbly built is a benefit for most moyos whitout spare cash. You pay less with cash but you pay the rest with uncomfort and pain of a thick needle buried in your body. Lets call it, Investment for profit.

HediffDef.label: deepblue extracter
HediffDef.description: A deepblue extracter installed. It will produce deepblue every often.\n\nA less barbaric way to extract deepblue from one's body. This is the most used model in the lighthouse being affordable without big drawbacks. Install one today!

li.label: itchy attachment
li.description: Its bit of a nusiance but I can't ask for more.

ThingDef.label: deepblue extracter
ThingDef.description: A deepblue extracter. Install this to a moyo to begin deepblue production.\n\nA less barbaric way to extract deepblue from one's body. This is the most used model in the lighthouse being affordable without big drawbacks. Install one today!
